STR.string: The residents of the city of Rietz.
The PC's faction. Not used in actual gameplay. Used to target only the PC with a talent.
A special event faction. A Messenger of Life attacks X-50.
Faction of Herbivore. Do Not Attack First. Counterattack Carnivores.

A long time ago, the Rengot Goblins lived in Teress Plain. When Humans came to conquer the area, the Goblins lost their home and were driven to the north. Since then, they have been waiting for an opportunity to reclaim their land.
These red-skinned Trolls have taken up residence on Mt. Eda. They are embroiled in a bitter war with the nearby White Yeti Tribe.
The white-haired Ogre tribe that lives on Mt. Eda. They are in constant battle with the nearby Mad Eye Tribe.
The Kobolds living in Mt. Eda Makot Village worship the Evil Dragon Kaizer, and safely protects its nest.
This independent clan formed from the contaminated members of the Makot Clan. This clan's members are much more violent than most Kobolds.
The Kobolds living in Makot Village of Mt. Eda worship the evil dragon Kaizer. They guard its nest from all threats.
Faction of Carnivore. Attack First. Attack Herbivores When Spotted.
The Akeron Tribe and the Togatt Tribe used to get along. After the swamp became contaminated, each tribe laid claim to the Breath of Light, and subsequently became enemies.
The Togatt Tribe and the Akeron Tribe used to get along. After the swamp became contaminated, each tribe laid claim to the Breath of Light, and subsequently became enemies.
Creepers that live in Cowen Marsh.
Creepers manipulated by the Black Lotus pheromone protect the user and fight Marsh Creepers.
Bonbons native to Cowen Marsh that manipulate Creepers using special pheromones.
The Dragon Slayer Guild, founded by Halfmaine, is made up of skilled dragon hunters from all over.
Virtuous Harpies that live in the Burning Forest.
A special event faction. Fights with Warrior Race 2 but friendly toward the PC.
Dragons that follow Magic Dragon Kaizer.
A special event faction. Fights with Warrior Race 1 but friendly toward the PC.
A special event faction. Halfmaine's faction.
A special event faction. Ancient Dragon Alkeino's faction. Attacks Halfmaine and not the PC.

Adre Kin in Rietz is having a hard time finding employees because people don't understand his unique fashion aesthetics and peculiar mannerisms. If you help him, he'll repay you with fabulous rewards.

Proud of their ability to discover diamonds in the rough, Lettier's Jewelers like to think of themselves as true creators and adventurers. Without their approval, even the world's most valuable stones cannot be cut into jewelry.
Missionaries of the goddess Renas. They are happy to provide blessings and healing potions to those in need.
Field monsters hostile toward the player.
Guards of the Great Wall of Silence. Only the kingdom's most valiant soldiers are permitted to join.
After failing to get past the Great Wall, Creepers are trying to collapse the wall by digging holes to weaken its foundations.
Guards assigned to protect Rietz Sewer from intruders.
The guardians of the Rendel kingdom.
All that is corrupted shall be purified beneath the holy wings of the Goddess Renas.
A subdivision of the Wings of Renas, the Gardeners of Renas are devoted to eradicating the evil influences in the Contaminated Garden.
Brune, the god of war, empowers his priests so that they can fight in the front lines. Someday he will call on them to join the war between the gods themselves.

Rendel's Royal Alchemists have dispatched a group of elite alchemists called the Eye of Brilliance on a mission to gather information on the Breath of Light. It's a mysterious item with the ability to purge contamination.
A barrier that defends against Darelle's magic
No reaction to attack by the player.
The red skinned Trolls and White Ogres of Mt. Eda are at war with one another.
The White Ogres and Mad Red Eye Trolls of Mt. Eda are at war with one another.
The Akerons have organized this combat unit consisting of their most aggressive Eboses and mercenaries for the dispute over the Black Swamp with the Togatts.
The Togatts have organized this combat unit consisting of their most aggressive Eboses and mercenaries for the dispute over the Black Swamp with the Akerons.
Group of Pirates Following Moken. Hostile to Tian of Broken Mast
Group of Monsters assaulting the Brokent Mast
Pompeius and Mustang in the Flower Garden Faction
The faction led by Chef Oliver of Ingen.
The faction led by Chef Edward of Rietz.
A band of musicians in Rietz, led by Maestro Poire.
